message: Alert: API latency exceeded 800ms threshold on service checkout-api.
Warning: Error rate spike detected on checkout-api.
Developer comment: investigating high error rate.
Log: Timeout when connecting to payments-service endpoint.
Infra alert: CPU usage 92 percent on checkout-api pods.
Observation: Error rate falling after restart.
Customer complaint: unable to checkout, getting 500 error.
Mitigation: scaling checkout-api from 3 to 6 pods.
Resolution: system stabilised, error rates normal.
